channel.title: Clicking on Options
channel.description: Okay, I'm trying to make a Varrock Rune Ess Miner but I can't figure out how to make it click on Teleport Aubury when I right click... Help please.

item.title: Clicking on Options
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:3, topic:86904”]Hmm… I think I’ll try the SCAR Text option, even though it doesn’t look very good… lol, oh well. Thanks! Bitmaps didn’t work for some reason. :S[/quote]Were your bitmaps too big? They have to be atleast 40x40.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Hmm… I think I’ll try the SCAR Text option, even though it doesn’t look very good… lol, oh well. Thanks! Bitmaps didn’t work for some reason. :S

item.title: Clicking on Options
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Slave Scyth:

Okay, I’m trying to make a Varrock Rune Ess Miner but I can’t figure out how to make it click on Teleport Aubury when I right click… Help please.

You could use bitmaps, DTMS or look for a text clicking function/procedure in the SRL manual.

Read full topic
